name: SCP: Pandemic
description:
Virus strains capable of an apocalyptic pandemic.
The story is focused around the SCP Foundation's development of new virus strains of SCP-008 to weaponize it within Area 12. In the mishandling of the virus - capable of a worldwide pandemic - their research site fell into a biological containment breach. In these events, the facility's staff became zomboid entities. The facility autonomously entered a lockdown phase to control the outbreak, but everyone inside remains locked in until The Foundation's task forces can arrive and secure the situation.GameplaySCP: Pandemic is a first-person tactical shooter putting you in the boots of an improvised fireteam within Area 12 during the site-wide biological containment breach. The staff within the facility are infected and want nothing more than to spread the virus by newfound instinct. You must fight through them and other entities that have escaped containment during the breach.
In addition, you may run into rogue armed resistance along the way.Broad ObjectivesRestore facility power.
Back up data from the server room.
Search through offices to investigate the event.
Gain samples from the SCP-008 lab.
Take control of the nuclear reactor.
Escape.
There are many secrets to learn about this scenario.
